content.query:
Create Table [BussinesCore].[Customer]
(
	CustomerIdSNK int not null IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED NOT ENFORCED, 
	CustomerId uniqueidentifier not null,
	[Name] varchar(300) not null,
	LegalCode varchar(50) not null,
	ZoneCode uniqueidentifier not null,
	ZoneName varchar(50) not null,
	CityCode uniqueidentifier not null,
	CityName varchar(50) not null
)
With
(
	Distribution = Replicate
)
